metadata.name: Night Light with Light Sensor
metadata.description: Battery-powered night light using photocell sensor. LED activates in darkness via ADC threshold detection.

components.description: Voltage divider resistor - part of light sensor circuit
Light sensor - resistance varies with ambient light
Red LED - illuminates when dark detected

wires.description: Power supply to voltage divider - connects Pico 3.3V to breadboard power rail
Power rail to divider resistor pin 1 - 3.3V to resistor
Ground rail setup - connects Pico ground to breadboard ground rail
Ground rail to divider resistor pin 2 - completes voltage divider
Voltage divider junction to photocell - same bus connection (column 15)
ADC input from sensor - photocell top pin to Pico ADC2 for light level reading
Photocell to ground - completes sensor circuit
GPIO to LED resistor - signal from Pico to current-limiting resistor
Resistor to LED anode - current flows to LED positive side
LED cathode to ground - completes LED circuit
